message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this great product! I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $120.
I'm interested in the product, but $120 is a bit steep for me. I'd be willing to pay $90.
I understand you're looking to save some money, but I need to make a profit. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so I'll offer the product to you for $110.
I appreciate the compromise, but $110 is still a bit too high for me. I'd be willing to pay $85.
I'm getting close to my minimum price, but I'm still willing to negotiate. I can offer you a deal for $100, which is the lowest I'm willing to go.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but $100 is still a bit high for me. I'd be willing to pay $92.
I'm not willing to go any lower than $100, but I'm willing to meet you at $95. This is my final compromise.
I appreciate your final compromise, but $95 is still a bit high for me. I'd be willing to pay $90.
I'm not willing to go back on my compromise, but I'll give you one last chance. I'll sell it to you for $92.50, which is the absolute lowest I'm willing to go.
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but $92.50 is still a bit high for me. I'd be willing to pay $89.
